description: The Light version of their classic fleece jacket is ideal for outdoor summer activities and those in-between seasons. The premium fleece made of Polartec® Power Grid™ material is light, incredibly soft and super comfortable on the skin. The patented waffle structure offers an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio and keeps the jacket extra breathable. It also dries quickly and packs down small. The Aconcagua Light can be worn on its own or as a mid-layer when mountaineering, climbing, ski touring or hiking. The tight-fitting cut makes it easy to wear under a hardshell or insulated jacket. Out in the mountains or going about your daily business, the Aconcagua Light is versatile, functional and stylish.
name: Mammut Aconcagua Light ML Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 89% Polyester, 11% Spandex - polartec recycled polyester knit
